General.Name: Chong Hong Construction Co Ltd
General.Description: Chong Hong Construction Co., Ltd. constructs, develops, leases, and sells residential and commercial buildings. The company operates in two segments, Building and Construction. It also leases factories; undertakes civil engineering and construction projects; and engages in the general merchandise retail trade business. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 30, Beiping East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 10049

1.Name: Mr. Mao-Ching  Chen
1.Title: CFO, Financial & Accounting Officer and Corp. Governance Officer
